A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars : The Last Jedi\n\nGiven what they had to work with (the greatest and most popular franchise in history\, plus the Star Wars characters and universe)... The Last Jedi is the worst movie ever made.  This story\, theme\, events and characters in this movie are massively incoherent\, inconsistent\, contradictory and disrespectful compared to episodes 1\, 2\, 3\, 4\, 5\, 6.  Just horrible.  Don't waste your money on this piece of SJW garbage.  On a scale of 0 to 10\, this movie deserves -10 (that's minus ten).
